name: AoS Tactical Zombie. Beta
description:
This is a concept strategy game, which would come closest to being a "RISK" type game.

Once the game has started, choose your starting character.

Each character provides a bonus for the game.

Increased damage, armor, ect ...

Tactical zombie mode:
Launch the tutorial in the map training.

The rules are simple.

Roll the die using the 'CLICK' button at the top right.
Use your actions to move around, then distribute your actions around you.
Each action represents an enemy. Then move, if an enemy is on the square, a fight starts.
The fight takes place automatically, watch your HP not to die in the next fight.
After capturing the number of objectives go to a helipad to leave the area.
Use your earning resources to improve your statistics or unlock new cards
to order.

--------------

Story mode in development, only one mission playable at the moment. Do not hesitate to give your opinion on the development and your ideas to improve the game.

Artworks by Tundr4 : https://www.deviantart.com/tundr4
